threats.title: Phishing
threats.description: Some malicious attackers can try to imitate the product's UI to get details of the customers.

threats.title: XSS
threats.description: Attackers can try to inject malicious code from the UI.

threats.title: Cookie stealing
threats.description: Attackers can try to steal cookies from Flipkart plus members
threats.mitigation:
Cryptography
Session management
Access control list

threats.title: Phishing
threats.description: Some malicious users can try to create UI similar to the app and get customers' details.

threats.title: XSS
threats.description: Attackers can try to inject malicious code from the UI.

threats.title: Repudiation
threats.description: User may claim he/she has not sent or received a certain message or mail.

threats.title: Man in the middle attack
threats.description: Attackers can try to steal the payment credentials of users by establishing themselves between user and payment gateway.
threats.mitigation:
Cryptography
Multi factor authentication
Digital Signatures

threats.title: SQL Injection
threats.description: Attackers can try to run malicious SQL commands to tamper or retrieve information.
threats.mitigation:
Input Sanitization
Use of prepared statements
Access control list

threats.title: Repudiation
threats.description: Attackers/Users can deny performing a certain database operation.

threats.title: Database inaccessibility
threats.description: Attackers can flood databases with fake transaction requests to cause the unavailability of databases for intended users.
threats.mitigation:
Firewall and IDS
Access control list

threats.title: Repudiation
threats.description: User/Attacker may claim that he/she has not placed a certain order.

threats.title: Man in the middle
threats.description: Unauthorized user can try to steal data by sitting between the customer and the Flipkart app

threats.title: Man in the middle
threats.description: Unauthorized user can try to steal data by sitting between the customer and the Flipkart app
